table.name: [dbo].[PhotoObj]
table.summary: The main Photo table for the NOAO Deep Field catalog containing the individual band detections
table.remarks: The main Photo table for the NOAO Deep Field catalog containing detections in the individual bands. The merged catalog will be located in the PhotoObjAll table

column.name: [OBJID]
column.summary: unique object id, hashed from BAND, FIELD and NUMBER

column.name: [MAGERR_ISOCOR]
column.summary: RMS error for corrected isophotal magnitude

column.summary: Profile RMS along minor axis (world units)

column.name: [ERRXY_IMAGE]
column.summary: Covariance of position between x and y

column.name: [ERRA_IMAGE]
column.summary: RMS position error along major axis

column.name: [ERRB_IMAGE]
column.summary: RMS position error along minor axis

column.name: [IMAFLAGS_ISO]
column.summary: FLAG-image flags OR'ed over the iso. profile

table.name: [dbo].[Neighbors]
table.remarks: SDSS objects within 2 arcsec and their match parameters stored here. The two halves of the pair come from different bands. The first half of the pair

column.name: [objID]
column.summary: The unique objId of the center object
